department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家語文碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Hakka Language and Literature, Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 1.建立對文學理論的基礎認識2.閱讀及吸收相關文學理論重要論述3.養成閱讀及獨立思考的習慣4.應用於客家文本的相關研究
goal.en: “1. Establish a foundation for understanding literary theory.2. Read and absorb important expositions related to literary theory.3. To develop the habit of reading and independent thinking.4. The applied research of Hakka text.“

outline.ch: 1.課程說明及文學理論與批評方法概述2.新批評與形式主義3.結構主義與符號學4.敘事學5.巴赫汀對話理論6.詮釋學7.讀者反應理論8.解構主義9.期末報告大綱口頭報告與討論10.傅科11.新歷史主義與文化物質主義12.後殖民主義13.性別研究14.精神分析15.文化研究與政治批評16.期末論文口頭報告與討論17.閱讀文獻並撰寫期末報告18.閱讀文獻並撰寫期末報告
outline.en: 1. The course description and Literary Theory and Criticism Methods.2. New Criticism and Formalism.3. Structuralism and semiology.4. Narratology.5. Bakhtinian Dialogism.6. Hermeneutics.7. Reader-Response Theory.8. Deconstruction.9. The final report outline an oral report and discussion.10. Michel Foucault.11. The new historicism and cultural materialism.12. Postcolonialism.13. Gender Studies.14. Psychoanalytic Criticism.15. Culture Studies and  The political criticism.16. The final paper and an oral report on the discussion.17. Read literature and write final report.18. Read literature and write final report.

gradMethod.ch:
＊出席率、課堂參與、口頭報告：50％
＊期末報告：50％
gradMethod.en:
Attendance, class participation, oral presentations: 50％
Final report: 50％

flexDiscription.ch: 本課程實體上課16週。未實體上課的那兩週，將安排文獻讓同學閱讀，以撰寫期末小論文。
flexDiscription.en: This course is physically taught for 16 weeks. In the two weeks when there is no physical class, the literature will be arranged for students to read to write the final essay.

ch.competencies: 具備客家語言文學研究的專業能力
具備客家語言文化傳承與發展的潛力

en.competencies: Academic training in Hakka linguistic and literature studies
Devotion to Hakka language and culture preservation and development
